DOC.brief_summary: Nonspecific low back pain ( NLBP ) diagnosis 85 % low back pain sufferer underlie medical cause ( e.g. , herniated disc , spinal stenosis ) require physician care . Treatment , however , impractical many physician implement office visit , relatively provider NLBP treatment follow national pain control guideline . This study evaluate efficacy on-line intervention use desktop computer mobile technology help user self treat NLBP occurrence engage activity decrease future occurences .
DOC.brief_title: Internet App Self-Manage Occasional Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Methods . A total 606 adult , 18 year age old recruit , screen , consent online . They assess on-line baseline , two month week , four month After baseline assessment , participant randomize NLBP treatment ( TX ) , alternative website control ( AWC ) , no-contact control group . The TX AWC group receive 8 weekly email prompt visit respective experimental website . Add Details .
